definition: (in ceramics, lacquerware etc) the base (made of clay, metal, bamboo etc) onto which a glaze, lacquer or other decorative elements are applied

sentences.english: The weakening of the diamond tool matrix performance was studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了金剛石工具胎體材料的性能“弱化”問題。

sentences.english: The padding is firm but ruder , green glazed with white.
sentences.chinese: 胎體堅質但較粗，釉色白中微閃青。

sentences.english: The pair of sidewalls comprises part of the carcass ply structure.
sentences.chinese: 一對側壁包括部分胎體簾布層結構。

sentences.english: Crown porcelain body body thick, green days slightly pink color, glazed piece to open big profile.
sentences.chinese: 官瓷胎體較厚，天青色略帶粉紅顏色，釉面開大紋片。

sentences.english: The carcass includes an internal circumference and tapered ends.
sentences.chinese: 胎體包括內周和漸縮端部。

sentences.english: Through the carbide layer, metallurgical binding is produced between matrix materials and diamond.
sentences.chinese: 通過碳化物層，胎體材料與金剛石之間產生冶金結合。
